intro.text: HIVE powers a growing ecosystem of Web 3.0 websites and applications.
intro.manage: Safely manage your funds and connect to HIVE based services with KEYCHAIN.

addAccountByKey.text: Add your existing HIVE account to Keychain

addAccountByAuth.text: Add the new account by specifying an account that has authority over it, and that is already saved in Hive Keychain.

addAccountByQR.wrongQR: Please scan a Hive Keychain account QR Code

wallet.add_memo: Please add your memo key to decrypt this message.
wallet.add_active: Please add your active key to perform this operation.

claim.error_posting: Please add your posting key to be able to claim rewards!

savings.disclaimer: Note: Withdrawing funds from savings will take 3.5 days.

warning.phishing: This account has been listed as a potential phishing account, check the spelling and make sure it is the account you want to transfer to.
warning.exchange_currency: This exchange account does not accept {{currency}} deposits.
warning.exchange_memo: Make sure you add a memo when transfering to an exchange account.
warning.missing_info: Please fill the username and amount to proceed

convert.title: Convert to {{to}}
convert.disclaimer_hive: You deposit collateral (HIVE), then you are given HBD up front worth half of the collateral amount (minus a 5% fee). Your official final payment is in 3.5 days. At that point remaining collateral (HIVE) is returned.
convert.disclaimer_hbd: Your HBD will take 3.5 days to get converted to approximately USD worth of HIVE tokens, based on its 3.5 days median price.

connect.title: Connect to Hive Auth
connect.text: A connection has been requested via Hive Auth for account @{{account}}.
connect.no_username: Please add account @{{account}} to your wallet to be able to use it on your favorite dApps!

auth.title: Authenticate
auth.success: Successfully authenticated @{{account}} on {{name}}! You can now return to your dApp.

challenge.ask: {{name}} wants to verify that you have the {{key}} authority for account @{{account}}
challenge.success: Successfully verified @{{account}} {{key}} authority on {{name}}! You can now return to your dApp.
challenge.no_key: You don't have the {{key}} key for account @{{account}}

info.t1: Hive Auth provides a way for any applications, (either web, desktop or mobile) to easily authenticate users, and additionally sign and broadcast transactions to the Hive blockchain, without asking them to provide any password or private key.
info.t2: To connect to a desktop dApp, use the QR Code scanner. On mobile, simply chose 'Sign in with Hive' on your favorite dApp.

session.time: How long do you wish to keep this session valid?

disclaimer.text: To receive funds, simply share your account name (displayed above) with the sender.
However, many applications will require a PRIVATE KEY to prove ownership or to conduct transactions on your behalf.
ONLY SHARE PRIVATE KEYS WITH PARTIES THAT YOU TRUST!
In the future, Hive Keychain for mobile will enable App to App transactions, removing the need to use your private keys directly in third-party Apps.

disclaimer: You can chose which RPC node is used to read information and broadcast transactions from/to the Hive Blockchain.
Use 'DEFAULT' RPC to let Hive Keychain chose the best RPC node at a given time.

moreInformation.title: KEYS (HIVE PASSWORDS)
moreInformation.text1: Different actions require the use of different KEYS. These KEYS are generated when a new HIVE account is created.
moreInformation.text2: You may use your Posting, Active, or Master Key to import your account.
moreInformation.text3: (Use your Master Key to unlock all app features).
moreInformation.text4: If you use a Master Key, it will NOT be saved and will only be used to generate your other Keys. You may add/edit Accounts or Keys at any time.

infoQR.title: Import via QR Code
infoQR.text1: You can import an account instantly by scanning its corresponding QR Code.
infoQR.text2: To import from Hive Keychain browser extension, navigate to

infoWalletQR.title: QR Code Scanner
infoWalletQR.text1: Use this scanner to read Hive related QR Codes.
infoWalletQR.text2: As of now, we only support starting Hive Authentication Service sessions and opening URLs in the in-App browser, but further functionalities will be added along the way.
infoWalletQR.text3: If you wish to scan a QR Code to import an account, please do so in

forgotPIN.title: Forgot PIN?
forgotPIN.text: If you forgot your PIN, you can reset Keychain and clear your data but will have to enter all your keys again.

unsupportedBiometrics.title: Unsupported biometrics
unsupportedBiometrics.text1: Your preferred biometrics is considered as unsafe on this device.

toast.transfer_token_confirmed: Your transfer was successfully broadcasted to Hive. Your balance might take a little while to update.
toast.transfer_token_unconfirmed: Your transfer was successfully broadcasted to Hive. However, we couldn't confirm that it was processed by Hive Engine. Please check your balance in a little while before trying again.
toast.stop_powerdown_success: You successfully stopped your Power down!

keys.not_a_key: This is not one of your private keys!
keys.copied: The key was copied to the clipboard!

toast.error_add_account: Something went wrong! Please verify your keys and your connection.
toast.savings_deposit_success: You succesfully deposited {{amount}} to your savings.
toast.savings_withdraw_success: You succesfully started a {{amount}} withdrawal from your savings. It will be credited to your account in 3.5 days.
toast.incorrect_user: Please check the username and try again.
toast.no_auth_account: Please save {{authorizedAccount}} in Hive Keychain to use it as an authorized account.
toast.no_accounts_no_auth: Please add at least one account with authority over {{username}}

message.decode: The website {{domain}} would like to verify that you have access to the private {{method}} key for the account: @{{username}}
message.signBuffer: The website {{domain}} would like to sign a message using the {{method}} key for the account: @{{username}}
message.signBufferNoUsername: The website {{domain}} would like to sign a message using the {{method}} key.

error.no_account: The current website is trying to send a request to Hive Keychain for account @{{account}} which has not been added to the wallet.
error.no_auth: The current website is trying to send a request to Hive Keychain for account @{{account}} using the {{auth}} key, which has not been added to the wallet.
error.no_active_auth: The current website is trying to send a request to Hive Keychain using active authority, but no account has been adeed with active key.
error.signTx: The transaction could not be signed successfully.
error.ops: There was an error broadcasting this transaction
error.unknown: Something went wrong! Please try again!
error.broadcasting: There was an error broadcasting this transaction, please try again.
error.addAccount: There was an error adding this account. Please verify its username and keys.

transfer.encrypt: Please add your memo key to encrypt memos.

success.signTx: The transaction has been signed successfully.
success.broadcast: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully.
success.power_down: Started a {{hp}} HP power down on @{{username}}.
success.undelegate: Succesfully stopped the delegation to @{{delegatee}} from account @{{username}}.
success.sendToken: The transaction has been broadcasted successfully. Please check your balance to confirm that it was processed succesfully.
success.addAccountAuthority: Successfully gave {{role}} authority to @{{authorizedUsername}} with a weight of {{weight}}.
success.addKeyAuthority: Successfully added a {{role}} key with a weight of {{weight}}.
success.convert: Succesfully started the conversion of {{amount}} {{from}} to {{to}}.
success.recurrentTransfer: Successfully started a recurrent transfer. {{amount}} {{currency}} will be sent to {{to}} {{executions}} times, every {{recurrence}} hours.

request.keep: Do not prompt again to send {{type}} transactions from the account @{{username}} on {{domain}}.
request.keep_has: Do not prompt again to send {{type}} transactions from the account @{{username}} on {{domain}} until this session expires.

drawerFooter.error30: You already vote for 30 witnesses. You will need to unvote one to vote for a new one.
drawerFooter.errorActive: You need an active key to vote for witnesses

error.retrieving_witness_ranking: An error occured while retrieving the witness ranking. Please try again later.
error.unvote_wit: Error while unvoting @{{name}} as a witness.
error.wit: Error while voting for @{{name}} as a witness.
error.active: To vote for a witness, you must first add your account active key

success.wit: Succesfully voted for @{{name}} as a witness.

witness.has_proxy: You are currently using @{{proxy}} as a proxy. Their votes are displayed.
witness.link_to_arcange: For more information, click here to access the witness database
witness.using_proxy: Clear the proxy to vote for a witness

proxy.has_proxy: The proxy account makes governance decisions on your behalf. If you wish to vote for witnesses and proposals by yourself, you must first remove the proxy.
proxy.proxy_def: Adding an account as a proxy means that the proxy account can use the weight of your HP in governance matters (voting for witnesses and proposals). This will not affect your HP regarding curation, and you can remove the proxy at any given moment.
proxy.using_proxy: You are currently using @{{name}} as a proxy.

error.active: To change your proxy, you must first add your account active key
error.set_proxy: Error while setting user as proxy

error.using_proxy: Clear the proxy to vote for a proposal
error.active: To vote for a proposal, you must first add your account active key
error.vote: There was an error while voting for a proposal!
error.unvote: There was an error while removing a proposal vote!

success.vote: You successfully voted for a proposal!
